page.title: 08TRAFFIC IN CULLOMPTON
page.content: A motorway makes a difference.Before the motorway,traffic would fill the main street from end to end,especially from June to September because of tourists travelling through to holiday resorts.Shops,garages,pubs and restaurants were very busy.The motorway by_passes Cullompton.Now we have few traffic jams but much less business from tourists. We conducted a short traffic survey before the tourist season was in full swing and found some 1 000 cars,300 lorries and vans were using the motorway every hour during the day,with some 400 cars and 50 vans and lorries passing through Cullompton.So although the railway station is now closed and all transport is by road travel through Cullompton is now much easier.
